name: Turtle With A Gun
description:
For a long time, turtle's have lived on the planet as an endangered species. They simply didn't want to do anything about it except for one odd turtle, who wanted the other turtle's to thrive. It's up to you to save the turtle race

--Controls--

A,W,S,D - Move

LeftClick - Fire

RightClick - Dash

--Features--

Arena Mode

(That's about it for now :P)

--Next Update--

Graphical Improvement
